mapper.select: SELECT JO_NO, JO_TITLE, JO_CONTENT, JO_SALARY, JO_FIELD_NAME, JO_CAREER_NAME, JO_DEADLINE, JO_HIT, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_EMAIL, CORP_CEO_NAME, CORP_BOARD_NAME, CORP_COUNTEMP FROM ( SELECT * FROM MEMBER M, CORPORATION C, JOBOFFER J, JO_FIELD J_F, JO_CAREER J_C WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = C.MEMBER_ID AND M.MEMBER_NO = J.MEMBER_NO AND J.JO_FIELD_NO = J_F.JO_FIELD_NO AND J.JO_CAREER_NO = J_C.JO_CAREER_NO ) WHERE JO_NO = ${jo_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE JOBOFFER SET JO_HIT = JO_HIT + 1 WHERE JO_NO = ${jo_no}
mapper.select: SELECT RS_NO, RS_TITLE FROM RESUME WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${member_no}
